name: Wayland Bar & Grill, The
text:
The Wayland Bar and Grill Call us (807) 577-5863 Take-Out/Reservations 1019 Gore St W, Thunder Bay, ON P7E 3T2
Appetizers
Appetizer Platter - $39.95 Smoked Onion dip and choice of two of our appetizers
St. Louis Taster - $16.95 4 individually cut rib bones, served with Wayland BBQ sauce
Smoked Belly - $12.95 Smoked pork belly cubes, Wayland BBQ sauce, cucumber salad
Pulled Pork Poutine - $12.95 Fries, Thunder Oak cheese curds, gravy, smoked pulled pork, Wayland BBQ sauce
Brisket Poutine - $12.95 Fries, Thunder Oak cheese curds, gravy, smoked brisket ends, Wayland BBQ sauce
Mozza Sticks - $13.95 Breaded mozzarella, deep fried, served with house tomato sauce
Burnt Ends - $14.95 Smoked brisket ends, cucumber salad, Wayland BBQ sauce
Smoked Onion Dip - $14.95 Smoked onions, cream cheese, Thunder Oak gouda, and spices. Served with tortilla chips
BBQ Baked Beans - $11.95 Wayland baked beans, with choice of burnt ends or pulled pork added inside. Served with crostini
Wings - $16.95 9 Chicken Wings with sauce or seasoning
Sauces/Seasonings: Salt & Pepper Cajun Lemon Pepper Roasted Pepper+ Garlic Wayland BBQ Carolina Pineapple BBQ Honey Garlic Buffalo Sauce Franks Hot Baton Rouge Thai Sauce Smokey Habanero (Smokey Sweet) Scorpion Habanero (In Your Face)
Classic Wayland Favourites
Fries - $4.95 Poutine - $7.95 Chicken Strips: 4pc - $11.95, 6pc - $17.95 Mushroom Caps - $9.95 Jalapeño Poppers - $11.95 Onion Rings - $6.95 Fried Pickles - $9.95
Finger Platter Chicken fingers with choice of sauce and 1 side 4 Strips - $13.95 6 Strips - $19.95
Nachos - $14.95 Nacho chips, shredded cheese, tomatoes, jalapeños, peppers, olives, bacon. Served with salsa & sour cream Extra Cheese - $2.99 Extra Bacon - $1.99 Add Brisket - $4.95 Add Pulled Pork - $4.95 Add Chicken - $4.95 Add Ground Beef - $2.95
Salads
Chicken Caesar Salad - $16.95 Romaine, croutons, bacon, parmesan, lemon wedge, chicken breast, house caesar.
House Salad - $8.95 Romaine, tomatoes, cucumber, red onions, carrots. With dressing of choice. Dressings: Ranch, Italian, French, Blue-Cheese, Caesar, Balsamic Vinaigrette.
Coleslaw - $4.95 Cabbage and carrots with creamy house-made dressing
Cucumber Salad - $4.95 Cucumber, with house made tangy vinaigrette.
Pizzas & Panzerottis Panzo’s $2.00 less!
Pep N’ Cheese - $18.95 Pepperoni, pizza sauce, mozzarella Just cheese? - $14.95
Hawaii 5-O - $18.95 Ham, pineapple, pizza sauce, mozzarella
Oh Canada - $20.95 Bacon, pepperoni, mushroom, onions, pizza sauce, mozzarella
The Deluxe - $21.95 Pepperoni, ham, onions, green peppers, olives, pizza sauce, mozzarella
The Meatza - $22.95 Pepperoni, ham, sausage, bacon, pizza sauce, mozzarella
Wayland Supreme - $23.95 Pepperoni, sausage, bacon, green peppers, mushrooms, onions, olives, pizza sauce, mozzarella
Bruschetta - $20.95 Tomato, red onions, mozzarella, parmesan, garlic oil, balsamic glaze.
Herbivore - $20.95 Mushrooms, onion, roasted red peppers, tomato, pizza sauce, mozzarella
Cheeseburger - $21.95 Burger, onion, pickles, bacon, Wayland burger sauce, pizza sauce, mozzarella
BBQ Chicken - $22.95 Chicken, red onions, roasted red peppers, mixed cheese, BBQ drizzle, pizza sauce, mozzarella
The Smokehouse - $22.95 Your choice of smoked pulled pork/smoked brisket burnt ends. Red onions, roasted red peppers, mixed cheese, BBQ drizzle, pizza sauce, mozzarella
3 Topping Pizza/Panzerotti Choice of 3 toppings: Mushroom, diced onion, pineapple, green peppers, green olives, black olives, roasted red peppers, pickles, tomato, hot peppers, jalapeño, pulled pork, brisket ends, pepperoni, sausage, ham, bacon, ground beef.
Smoked Plates
Rib Plate: 5 Bones - $21.95, 10 Bones - $34.95 Smoked St. Louis Ribs, fries, coleslaw, and 1 side
Rib N’ Wing - $29.95 Smoked St. Louis Ribs, 5 wings with choice of sauce or seasoning, coleslaw, fries, and 1 side
Rib N’ Ends - $29.95 St. Louis Ribs, smoked brisket ends, fries, coleslaw, and 1 side
BYO BBQ Platter - $44.95 Choice of 3: 4 Rib bones, burnt ends, smoked pork belly, pulled pork. With fries, cucumber salad, coleslaw, beans, and 2 kaisers. Get all four meats: + $9.95
Sides Add a side - $4.95 Fries, Coleslaw, House Salad, Cucumber Salad, Baked Beans
Premium Sides Fries + Gravy + $1.00 Onion Rings + $2.00 Poutine + $3.00 Caesar Salad + $3.00 Pork Poutine + $8.00 Brisket Poutine + $8.00
Handhelds Handhelds include 1 side of choice.
Burnt End Burger - $17.00 3oz Patty, cheddar, brisket ends, crispy onions, cucumber salad, roasted garlic aioli and Wayland BBQ sauce, Roma Bakery kaiser
Pulled Pork - $14.95 Smoked pulled pork, coleslaw, pickles, Carolina pineapple BBQ sauce, Roma Bakery kaiser
Brisket Sandwich - $14.95 Brisket ends, pickles, crispy onions, roasted garlic aioli, Wayland BBQ sauce, Roma Bakery kaiser
Chicken Club - $15.95 Chicken, lettuce, tomato, bacon, Alabama white BBQ sauce, roasted garlic aioli, Roma Bakery kaiser
Buffalo Wrap - $15.95 Chicken, mixed cheese, buffalo, lettuce, tomato, ranch, tortilla
Wayland Cheesesteak - $14.95 Brisket ends, cheddar, sautéed peppers and onions, roasted garlic aioli, Roma Bakery panini
Classic Burger - $10.95 Two 3oz patties, ketchup, mustard, relish, lettuce, tomato, Roma Bakery kaiser
Wayland Smashburger - $11.95 Two 3oz patties, cheddar, lettuce, tomato, pickles, onions, Wayland burger sauce, Roma Bakery kaiser
Mozza Burger - $13.95 Two 3oz patties, mozzarella, lettuce, tomato, bacon, sautéed mushrooms, roasted garlic aioli, Roma Bakery kaiser
Caesar Wrap - $15.95 Chicken, bacon, parmesan, lettuce, caesar dressing, tortilla
